summary.para: Generate a new sequential using the comb algorithm.
The comb algorithm is designed to make the use of GUIDs as Primary Keys, Foreign Keys, and Indexes nearly as efficient as ints.

member.name: M:Elect.Core.SimilarityUtils.Euclidean.Distance(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Double},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Double})
member.summary: Euclidean the distance

members.member: The Jaroâ€“Winkler distance metric is designed and best suited for short strings such as person names, and to detect typos; it is (roughly) a variation of Damerau-Levenshtein, where the substitution of 2 close characters is considered less important then the substitution of 2 characters that a far from each other. Jaro-Winkler was developed in the area of record linkage (duplicate detection) (Winkler, 1990). It returns a value in the interval [0.0, 1.0]. The distance is computed as 1 - Jaro-Winkler similarity.

member.name: P:Elect.Core.SimilarityUtils.JaroWinkler.Threshold
member.summary: The current value of the threshold used for adding the Winkler bonus. The default value is 0.7.

member.name: M:Elect.Core.SimilarityUtils.JaroWinkler.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance with default threshold (0.7)

member.name: M:Elect.Core.SimilarityUtils.JaroWinkler.#ctor(System.Double)
member.summary: Creates a new instance with given threshold to determine when Winkler bonus should be used. Set threshold to a negative value to get the Jaro distance.

member.name: M:Elect.Core.SimilarityUtils.JaroWinkler.Similarity(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Compute Jaro-Winkler similarity.
member.returns: The Jaro-Winkler similarity in the range [0, 1]
member.exception: If s1 or s2 is null.

member.name: M:Elect.Core.SimilarityUtils.JaroWinkler.Distance(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Return 1 - similarity.
member.exception: If s1 or s2 is null.
